meanings.definition: At an unspecified or indefinite time in the future.
meanings.sent1: We will go to the park sometime.
meanings.sent2: I will finish my homework sometime later.
meanings.sent3: Maybe sometime in the future, we will all have flying cars.
meanings.sent4: Dreams of traveling the world will come true sometime.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map promised riches sometime ahead.

meanings.definition: At an unspecified or indefinite time in the past.
meanings.sent1: She visited the museum sometime last year.
meanings.sent2: They met sometime during their childhood.
meanings.sent3: The dinosaur roamed the earth sometime in the past.
meanings.sent4: Legends say dragons existed sometime centuries ago.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins were built sometime before our time.

meanings.definition: At an unspecified or indefinite time in the present.
meanings.sent1: I will call you sometime today.
meanings.sent2: Let's have lunch sometime this week.
meanings.sent3: The mystery novel reveals the killer sometime in the present.
meanings.sent4: The sun sets sometime every day.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloom sometime in the spring.
